item.title: Pro Plugin - New User Guides & Support tools
item.description: Until a few days ago, I’d been relying on e-mail to manage your support requests. During the past 3 months I’ve looked at different options to provide support and also publish user guides and support material - beyond what’s in the readme files. Announcing Help & User Guides for Pro Plugins Anyone who has brought a Pro plugin from me, will now get access to Help Key features of the new site include:
